New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 50th ODI century, breaking Sachin Tendulkar's record
Mohammed Shami took 7 wickets in an ODI, the 14th-best performance in history
Key Match Events: Mohammed Shami took 7 wickets for 57 runs, leading India to victory
Daryl Mitchell scored 134 runs, the highest score in a World Cup semi-final
Ravindra Jadeja took a crucial catch to dismiss Glenn Phillips
India won by 70 runs, securing their place in the World Cup final
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed pride in the team's performance and achievement
Rohit Sharma praised Mohammed Shami's performance and the team's overall effort
Kane Williamson congratulated India and acknowledged their outstanding play
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shami's performance was described as 'out of this world'
The match was won by the bowlers despite New Zealand's efforts
India have now won five games batting first and five chasing in this World Cup
Others: Shubman Gill retired hurt during the match
